arena

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • arena.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The main game board class. A Board object maintains a 2-dimensional array of references to every Occupant in the game. In addition, the Board keeps track of the scores for both teams. It also contains a set of utility methods that Brains can use to help determine their strategies. Note that a number of methods here are package-private, which means that they cannot be accessed by Brains outside of this package.

    • Method Detail

      • numRows

        public int numRows()
        Determines the number of rows of the game board.
        Returns:
        the number of rows in this Board

      • numCols

        public int numCols()
        Determines the number of columns of the game board.
        Returns:
        the number of columns in this Board

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(int row,
                       int col)
        Determines whether or not a particular location (row and column) represents a legal space within the confines of the board. Note that this method only checks whether or not a space is on the board--not whether or not the space is empty or anything else.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the space to be checked
        col - the column of the space to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the (row, col) represents a valid space in this Board, false otherwise

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(int row,
                       int col)
        Determines whether or not a particular location (row and column) represents a legal empty space within the confines of the board.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the space to be checked
        col - the column of the space to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the (row, col) represents a space which is both valid (within the confines of the board) and empty, false otherwise

      • get

        public Occupant get(int row,
                    int col)
        Returns the occupant at location (row, col) on the Board
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the requested location
        col - the column of the requested location
        Returns:
        the Occupant at location (row, col), or null if the space is empty.

      • getAllPlayers

        Returns:
